Dòmine: qŭóniam sanctus sum~; salvum fac servum tuum
et exáŭdi me: sperántem in te. ^ Preserve my soul
qŭóniam inops et paŭper sum ego. ^ Incl: for I am holy~; save thy servant

aŭrem tuam: qŭóniam ad te clamávi tota die. ^ Have mercy on me
qŭóniam inops et paŭper sum ego. ^ Incl: for I have cried to thee all the day.

et exáŭdi me: ánimam meam levávi. ^ Give joy to the soul of thy servant
and hear me: I have lifted up my soul.

et exáŭdi me: et multaĕ misericórdiaĕ òmnibus invocántibus te. ^ For thou
and hear me: and plenteous in mercy to all that call upon thee.

et exáŭdi me: et intènde voci deprecatiónis meaĕ. ^ Give ear
and hear me: and attend to the voice of my petition.

1 ^ Inclína: 7 ^ In die tribulatiónis meaĕ clamávi ad te
Dòmine: qŭia exaŭdivìsti me. ^ I have called upon thee in the day of my trouble

1 ^ Inclína: 8 ^ Non est sìmilis tui in deîs
aŭrem tuam: et non est secùndum ópera tua. ^ There is none among the gods like unto thee
qŭóniam inops et paŭper sum ego. ^ Incl: and there is none according to thy works.

et exáŭdi me: et glorificábunt nomen tuum. ^ All the nations thou hast made shall come and adore before thee
O Lord: and they shall glorify thy name.

Dòmine: et fáciens mirabìlia~; tu ès Deus solus. ^ For thou art great and dost wonderful things~; thou art God alone.

et exáŭdi me: et ingrédier in veritáte tua~; laĕtétur cor meum ut tìmeat nomen tuum. ^ Conduct me
and hear me: and I will walk in thy truth~; let my heart rejoice that it may fear thy name.

et exáŭdi me: et glorificábo nomen tuum in aĕtèrnum~; ^ I will praise thee
and hear me: and I will glorify thy name for ever~;

1 ^ Inclína: 13 ^ qŭia misericórdia tua magna est super me
Dòmine: et eruvìsti ánimam meam ex infèrno inferióri. ^ for thy mercy is great towards me
aŭrem tuam: and thou hast delivered my soul out of the lower hell.
et sinagóga potentium qŭaĕsivérunt ánimam meam
et exáŭdi me: et non proposuérunt te in conspèctu suo. ^ O God
qŭóniam inops et paŭper sum ego. ^ Incl: the wicked are risen up against me
O Lord: and the assembly of the mighty have sought my soul
and hear me: and they have not set thee before their eyes.

Dòmine: et miserére mei~; da impèrium tuum púero tuo
aŭrem tuam: et salvum fac fílium ancìllaĕ tuaĕ. ^ O look upon me
et exáŭdi me: and have mercy on me~; give thy command to thy servant
qŭóniam inops et paŭper sum ego. ^ Incl: and save the son of thy handmaid.

O Lord: et consolátus ès me. ^ Show unto me a token for good
and hear me: that they who hate me may see
column10: hast helped me and hast comforted me.
